content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: It prints  true  for all possible values of  n.
It prints  false  for all possible values of  n.
It prints  true  if  n  is between  10  and  50,  inclusive, and prints  false  otherwise.
It prints  false  if  n  is between  10  and  50,  inclusive, and prints  true  otherwise.

content.answer: It prints  true  for all possible values of  n.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
